Name: The Preserve Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & 3 raspberries.
Review: Slightly sweetened bourbon laced with raspberry jam - at least that's how it tastes.
History: Created in 2010 by Gareth Edge at Opal Lounge, Edinburgh, Scotland.
